A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to the irrational band of angry nerds ripping this movie to shreds. They're upset their pet theories didn't pay off. My favorite thing about this wonderful film is that it constantly surprised me. After three viewings I'm still emotionally invested in it. No\, it isn't perfect but it's as bulletproof as any entry in this saga has ever been. As a lifelong fan\, I wholeheartedly endorse this Star Wars episode. It easily ranks in the top two or three of the series in my mind. You won't find finer acting\, sharper writing or more beauty in any previous entry. Rian Johnson made all the right choices here.
